divs: Sighting DetailsSaturday April 30, 2011. approximately 1-1:30 pm. it was partly cloudy, with the sun shining, and it was windy. My youngest daughter and i were flying her kite on the fairmont soccer fields, it is flat there, no obstructions, and we had it to ourselves. I was looking up at the kite while my daughter was flying it, and then i saw 6 round objects in a "V" formation heading from south to north. At first i thought they were geese and i kept telling myself they were. But as they flew above us they were spherical. they sort of looked like stars. and judging by distance they were probably the size of a fighter jet. i was screaming to my daughter to ask her if she could see them. She couldn't at first. "That cloud?" she asked. "No, above it!" i answered. "What the---!" Just before she said that they dispersed in an erratic pattern. they moved like nothing i had ever seen before. Then, one by one they disappeared into the cloud they were near. i tried to take a photo of it with my phone but it does not take good photos of far away objects. i tried to look to see if there were more of them, but there wasn't that i could see. i felt and still feel uneasy about the entire thing. i felt a little releif when i saw on the internet sightings of the exact same things all over the world. but i don't think will ever look up at the sky for a long time, and i am very nervous about flying in a plane this summer for our family vacation.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairmont
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Daytime sighting UFO's in a V formation.
